definition: a speedboat that is equipped with winglike structures that lift it so that it skims the water at high speeds, glide on the water in a hydroplane
details:
noun
- a speedboat that is equipped with winglike structures that lift it so that it skims the water at high speeds
= example: a speedboat that is equipped with winglike structures that lift it so that it skims the water at high speeds
= synonyms: hydrofoil
- an airplane that can land on or take off from water
= example: an airplane that can land on or take off from water
= synonyms: seaplane
verb
- glide on the water in a hydroplane
= synonyms: seaplane
